text: The European Centre for Antiziganism Research (ECAR) is a not-for-profit organization dedicated to combating Antiziganism, or prejudice against Romani people, also known as Gypsies. ECAR gained headlines worldwide when it filed a complaint with German prosecutors against the movie Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit Glorious Nation of Kazakhstan for defamation and inciting violence against the Romani people. ==See also== * Antiziganism ==External links== * *Borat Lawsuits Category:Antiziganism in Europe Category:Romani advocacy Category:Romani in Europe
